subject: Basketball
Politics and Government
lead_paragraph: Chris Dudley, who stands 6 feet 11 inches and played for the Nets and the Knicks during a 16-year career, stands out while campaigning to become Oregon’s governor.
snippet: Chris Dudley, who stands 6 feet 11 inches and played for the Nets and the Knicks during a 16-year career, stands out while campaigning to become Oregon’s governor.
